entities.name: pain
entities.description: Pain is mentioned as a reaction from Harry and his friends when they see Macnair, one of their enemies.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main protagonist of the story. He is described as reacting to the situation with 'STUPEFY!'.

entities.name: macnair
entities.description: Macnair is a Death Eater and Buckbeak's would-be killer. His mask slipped off, revealing his swollen and bloodshot eye.

entities.name: buckbeak
entities.description: Buckbeak is mentioned as Macnair's target for killing.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is a friend of Harry's. He is pulled aside by Harry and later attacked by Dolohov.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is a Death Eater who is dueling with another Death Eater.

entities.name: dolohov
entities.description: Dolohov is a Death Eater who attacks Harry and Neville.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is lying on his side, bleeding from the head. His magic eye spins away across the floor.

entities.name: death eater
entities.description: Death Eaters are a group of people who are fighting against Harry and his friends.

relationships.description: Harry is an opponent of Macnair, as they are on opposite sides in the fight.
Neville is a victim of Dolohov's attack.
Harry and Moody are allies, as they are both fighting against the Death Eaters.
Sirius is a member of the Death Eaters.
Harry is a protector of Buckbeak, as Macnair was trying to kill him.
